connector.description: Receive data from an FTPS server.

camel.kamelet.ftps-source.connectionHost.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-source.connectionHost
camel.kamelet.ftps-source.connectionHost.description: The hostname of the FTPS server.

camel.kamelet.ftps-source.connectionPort.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-source.connectionPort
camel.kamelet.ftps-source.connectionPort.description: The port of the FTPS server.

camel.kamelet.ftps-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-source.username
camel.kamelet.ftps-source.username.description: The username to access the FTPS server.

camel.kamelet.ftps-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-source.password
camel.kamelet.ftps-source.password.description: The password to access the FTPS server.

camel.kamelet.ftps-source.passiveMode.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-source.passiveMode
camel.kamelet.ftps-source.passiveMode.description: Specifies to use passive mode connection.

camel.kamelet.ftps-source.recursive.name: camel.kamelet.ftps-source.recursive
camel.kamelet.ftps-source.recursive.description: If a directory, look for files in all sub-directories as well.
